thread.title: Vivo successfully launched their flagship product at Royal Cliff
thread.title_full: Vivo successfully launched their flagship product at Royal Cliff

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Vivo successfully launched their flagship product at Royal Cliff
text:
Vivo successfully launched their flagship product at Royal Cliff Vivo successfully launched their flagship product at Royal Cliff Details Category: Hotel   16:45 Chinese smartphone maker Vivo recently launched its new flagship mobile telephone, the vivo X5 Pro under the concept “touched by beauty” at the Royal Cliff Hotels Group on July 15, 2015. The new product launch was a remarkable success as it was well attended by executives from vivo service (Thailand) led by Mr. Yiming Yao, the Chief Executive Officer of vivo service (Thailand) and the company’s business partners. Valued guests were entertained and guided through the distinguished features of the vivo X5 Pro by Mr. Pongsuk Hiranpreuk, a renowned IT television host and Mr. Suriyont Arunwattanakul, a popular Thai actor through a 3D interactive presentation. 
On the same evening, guests had a great opportunity to savour a buffet spread prepared by Royal Cliff’s award-winning culinary team at the dinner party held at the resort infini pool. Not only was the event highlighted by a mini concert from “Two Poptorn” and “Lipta”, a popular Thai band, guests were also excited by a lucky draw which had 3 vivo X5 Pro mobile telephones and plane tickets from Nok Air as prizes. “We are honoured that vivo service (Thailand) chose the Royal Cliff Hotels Group as the venue to host their new product launch.” Mr. Vitanart Vathanakul, Executive Director of the Royal Cliff Hotels Group said. “We always look forward to hosting events of this scale as it is a great opportunity to showcase our property’s outstanding facilities and exceptional services.” Situated on a 64 acre private parkland estate overlooking the stunning Gulf of Thailand, the Royal Cliff Hotels Group has been honored with multiple awards and recognition from organizations of national and international repute. It is the only resort in Asia/Pacific to be elevated in TTG Travel Hall of Fame for 8 consecutive years. It is home to four award winning 5-star hotels offering a sensory experience defined profoundly by its style, culture and elegance - all presented with the distinctive spirit of the State of Exclusivity and Fascination.
